Here are my recommendations based on user preference cues:

1. 'Amen.' (2002)  
This movie tells the story of Tommy Riley, who has moved with his dad to Chicago from a nice place. He keeps to himself, goes to school. However, after a street fight he is noticed and quickly falls into the world of illegal underground boxing - where punches can kill.
The main character, Tommy Riley, is played by David Hemmings. The supporting characters are played by Walter Brennan, Humphrey Bogart, Robert Klein, Rene Auberjonois, Alan Arkin, Mia Farrow, Christopher Lee, Jeff Bridges.

2. 'Gladiator.' (2000)  
This movie tells the story of a Roman general named Maximus who has been given command over the Roman army by the Roman Emperor Augustus. However, Maximus is not satisfied with the way things are being done and he decides to go against the wishes of Augustus and the Roman Senate and instead try to negotiate peace with the barbarian tribes that have been invading Roman territory.
Maximus' main character, Maximus himself, is played by Kevin Spacey. The supporting characters in this movie include actor Michael Sheen playing General Licinius Glaucon; actress Mia Farrow playing皇后 Cleopatra; actor Jeff Bridges playing the king of Persia, Xerxes; and actress Connie Nielsen playing Queen Zenobia.
